txt.en: Defeat many snow-beasts in the Misty Mountains.
Defeat snow-beasts in the Misty Mountains

You have learned no more about the origins of these strange creatures than the day you first encountered one. They are savage brutes however, and they share no love of the Free Peoples of Middle-earth -- or anyone else from all you have seen. Fortunately, they can be defeated much like any other dangerous beast, and you have fought your share and lived to tell the tale.
